video_prompt: Building surfaces subtly shimmer. Flowers and foliage gently sway in a breeze. Pendant lights inside softly pulsate. Steam rises from baked goods. Milk bottles frost. Awning subtly ripples. People move through the entrance. A small animal scurries near potted plants. A sign slowly rotates.
image_prompt: A vibrant, charming, cartoon-style shop or cafe with an inviting atmosphere. Features a light-colored building, blue tiled roof, and exposed wooden beams. Lush green foliage and pink/purple flowers cascade from above. A teal archway with colorful mosaic patterns frames an arched wooden door and a semi-circular wooden window. Inside, shelves stocked with bottles are lit by three yellow pendant lights. A wooden counter holds flowers, baked goods, and drinks. A red and white striped awning covers a smaller window displaying foodstuffs. An outdoor seating area with wooden table and pink/blue chairs, and numerous potted plants, completes the scene. Paved grounds, bright colors (blues, pinks, yellows, greens) create a cheerful ambiance.
refined_video_prompt: Building surfaces subtly shimmering. Flowers and foliage gently swaying. Pendant lights inside softly pulsating. Steam rising from baked goods. Milk bottles gradually frosting. Awning subtly rippling. People moving through the entrance. A small animal scurrying near potted plants. A sign slowly rotating.
